== Devices supported per channel ==

The lists below show which devices are treated as the main supported devices for a selected channel. This means that only the listed device types will receive QA sanity tests before image promotion, and the image will only be promoted when those pass. The device in bold generally is considered the main device for the channel, receiving proper regression testing during promotion testing as well.

=== Ubuntu stable channels ===

Channel names: ubuntu-touch/stable/*

* '''Krillin'''
* '''Vegeta'''
* '''Arale'''
* Mako
* Flo
* Emulator

=== Ubuntu devel channels ===

Channel names: ubuntu-touch/devel/*

* Mako
* Krillin
* Vegeta
* Arale
* Emulator
* ''Flo''
* ''Manta''
